Snow Berry nya asem, manis dan enak! Porsinya pas dengan toping yang sangat banyak! Nyummm.. Jenis berry nya juga banyak, blueberry, cranberry, rasberry, dan lain-lain. Puas banget! Snow Greentea with Redbean-nya cocok banget! Pahitnya Greentea sangat pas dipaduin sama manisnya Redbean. Mochi nya juga enak. Ini favorite banget, kalau ke Lotte Avenue kayak kunjungan wajibnya. Tempatnya sangat cozy, tenang dan bersih. Pelayannya ramah dan makanan cepat datengnya. Es nya sangat halus jadi ga susah makannya. Pokoknya enak banget!

Ryuumaki or dragon roll is a must try in this place. I believe others also mention about this dragon roll. But the tuba spicy is a total blob for me. I also like the itako wasabi, raw octopus in cutlets mixed in wasabi. Surprisingly good. Wasabi served as background flavor and aroma neutralizing octopus raw smell. Sashimi lovers will love this, i think. Matsu set is also a recommended menu. Overall it is a good place. The waiter has some knowledge about table manner, surprisingly very polite. I'd like to come to this place and try some other menus again.,duh sushi di sini enak-enak dan fresh banget. Kalo lagi sekarat duit, bisa pesen sushi yg jagung mayonaise cuman 12.000 udah enak pake banget. Ke sini biasanya pesen dragon roll dan Lidako. Rasanya luar biasa enak :"") Gratis ocha lagi. Servicenya juga oke, cuman kalo weekend akan crowded banget dan bakalan pake waiting list. Tapi akan worth kok :)

I went there last month for lunch. It was quite a horrible experience. First, the girl at the front wasnt friendly (ms. V). She did no effort to get us a table though it was already passed my reservation time and my daughters were ready to eat the lion statues When we got a table, courtesy of my friend, I asked the waitress (and Ms. V earlier) about the dimsum arrangement and we were told that the food here at Shang were served at the buffet station. Thats it. So we just had what they served at the buffet, which was of poor quality. Ms. V and the waitress never mentioned that we could actually order ala carte from the menu and its included in the buffet price. To top it off, when I paid, I showed my membership and the waitress STILL didnt have the courtesy to tell me that I could get 50% off with the membership but instead told me, because I paid with BCA card platinum I got 10% off. Well, my first and the last, Shang...

Rasanya enak dengan harga bersahabat. Satu porsi cukup buat dua orang sebenernya kalo yg makan cewe2 dengan porsi standar. Steamboat seafood sama kakap sayur asinnya seger. Cocok lah,beberapa hari yg lalu,, pengen banget tom yam. pas bgt tmn gue ngajakin makan d fooftemptation, langsung gue cari yg macem steamboat gtu. akhirnya ada juga nih dsni, gue bingung pilih menu yg mna abisnya pengen semuanya,,haha fokus ajah di seafood soalnya biar dapet udang,bakso ikan, sama ada cumi, sayurannya juga nais. berhubung emg gue suka asem seger gitu, cocok laaah... gue minta padahal gak pake nasi, eh trnyta include nasi. tapi emg sayng sungguh syg krn emg gue udh kenyang sm kuah tomyamnya jadinya nasinya cuma gue makan seperempat ajah. naaais deh pokoknya~~ cuma dg harga 43rb udah bikin kenyang hehee

Bener dower wer wer dgn level on fire,emang lg pengen makan chicken wing yg pedes,kepo deh milih wing king yg wing nya bbq sauce on fire,chick in box nya rasa thailicious dengan level hot,sehabis makan ini bener bibir gw mangap ga bisa tutup #yaelahpedesnyanampolboo habis tu ochanya habis ludes seketika 10 dari 10 deh yg suka makan pedes bole nyobaaaa
Penasaran sama prince house pas kesini kecewa parah . Lama banget dan servis nya ga memuaskan . Makanan nya standar bgtt . Wafle doang yg mendingan sm pizza nya . Panini nya alot banget .

Other than the fact that the place has little to no ac and no tabasco (crucial for an Italian resto), the place serves great pasta and pizza. Quite pricey compared to other restaurants within the area.

Been hanging out at this mall couple of times but never noticed that this cafe exists! Well, it caught my eyes when I saw the sofa that allows you to relax your feet with the view by the balcony 😁. Food options & beverages are quite vary so you definitely can enjoy your time, relaxing while having a nice afternoon view.
Trying their cute looking cold pressed juice, i had the green something i forgot the name. Taste nice and refreshing. Looking for healthy options at pasar santa, judas is one of em.

Well, this is actually a very simple restaurant but have quite a great concept. Foods are mostly Instant Noodle and rice, but they have several options of additional toppings, like ham, eggs, cheese, green chili, etc., which makes it interesting. More options for eating Instant Noodle (even though not a healthy food though :D) Drinks are okay, not too bad and not too good. I ordered their Lemon Tea and Coffee, both are acceptable. The great one in this place is that you can hangout and even play with your friends and families with the games that they provided and they are classic games, like board games, UNO (Stacko and Cards), Soccer Boards, etc. it makes a lot of fun, IMHO. Price-wise, quite okay and affordable, will not make you broke.

New Japanese Restaurant in Kelapa Gading. Kesan pertama saat masuk adalah ruangannya terlalu gelap, masalahnya untuk ngeliat makanannya aja jadi gelap sehingga ga bisa menggugah selera. Mungkin karena gelap juga, sehingga jadi banyak nyamuk di dalamnya, aku paling sebel banget makan sambil harus berjuang melawan nyamuk dan gatal. Untuk makanannya sebenernya lumayan ok kok, rasanya enak dan harganya ga terlalu mahal. Makanan yang di komplain hanya miso soup nya terlalu asin. Gw sih kepengen balik lagi, tapi kayanya tentang lampu dan nyamuk mesti diperbaiki deh, karena itu mengurangi kenikmatan makannya.

It s raining hard this Sunday morning and the chef here knows how to cheer up people. My order, Bangers n Mash, are set into a smiley face. This simple menu of 2 pork sausages n mash potatoes with mushroom sauce suddenly becomes exciting!

I heard about this place from friends who said it was Indonesia's version of Chipotle (one of the places I miss most), so decided to try it out. I chose the beef burrito and got the usual toppings I get back home - black beans, cilantro rice, corn salsa, sour cream, cheese and lettuce with a side of guac. The taste was really great and even had a bit of heat to it. My only complaint was that for the price (110k for a beef burrito + side of guac), the portion was a bit small, but that won't stop me from visiting again.

Waktu baru buka pertama-tama di gading, hampir tiap hari kesini. One of my favorite ! Rasa dan harganya pas buat semua kantong. belum lagi kalau makan ini minumnya beer, dan suasananya juga cocok banget buat anak muda dan orang tua,

Setelah sekian lama pengen coba Pretzel Auntie Anne's.. akhir cobain juga di Grand Indonesia.. harga affordable, rasanya juga enak. Yang gw beli Parmesan Cheese Pretzel, pengen coba rasa yang lainnya juga

Sebenernya ini sudah kali ke berapa saya kesini.. saya suka tempatnya.. design interiornya bagus dan tempatnya enak buat nongkrong.. saya suka all minumannya disini.. menurut saya minumannya semua enak dan Locale itu sangat inovatif sekali dengan menu minumannya.. namanya unik-unik, sering ada menu baru dan rasanya enak.. makanannya adalah makanan Indonesia.. rasanya lumayan namun porsinya agak kurang, seperti persis kemarin malam saya pesen soto betawi, isian dagingnya kurang sekali dengan kuah yg segitu banjir.. yang kurang lagj disini adalah pelayanannya.. seperti kemarin saya pesen hot milk tea.. waktu dianter ke saya milk tea nya tidak manis, belum dikasih gula dan penyajiannya tidak rapih.. tatakan tissue nya tertumpah milk tea namun tidak diganti tetap disajikan kepada saya, jadi sepertinya asal.. untuk harga standardlah sesuai dengan makanan dan minuman yg disajikan..
Steak outback daging prime rib recommended. Dagingnya juice banget dan tempatnya juga asik.
Tastes heavenly, but it is still overprice for a box of martabak. Went there around 9ish, only one or two orders before us so it was quick to get our martabak.
Palumara,calamary,ikan bakar parape is my fav!! You should to taste it!
One of the cheapest beer house in the pik area.. And their food also good.. I love the noodle here.. Every kind of it.. But almost every night this place is very crowded

It's ok, nothing particularly great, nothing particularly bad. I do think the main restaurant in Grand Indonesia is better. I suppose that the restaurant is owned / managed by Ranch Supermarket company, so it's a pity that the ingredients aren't fresher and of better quality

Ud 2x nyoba mkn disini n memang tmpt nya selalu ramai, yg paling gw inget disini malah bkn menu bebeknya tp malah rasa es teh manisnya ud enak ukuran nya gede lg...hehehe tp bebek goreng sama sambelnya enak kok...,ruame buangeettttt!!! tapi ga peduli. tetep dihajar demi bebek rica rica kesukaan gw! enak banget ini suka banget cuma kekurangannya adalah kadang bebeknya suka dingin. itu doang. kalo temen temen sih bilang biasa aja ya.. tapi kalo menurut gw sih bebek rica ricanya ga nahan sih enaknya :D

Untuk spot foto bole lah. Ada nuansa ala ala jugle land gt. Banyak pohon kecil. Dan sekat kawat sekelilingnya. Hanya saja tempat ini kurang tinggi untuk sebuah rooftop karna hanya dilantai 7 tp untuk relax rasanya mase oke banget

Minus: - Non-smoking area ada di lantai bawah tapi areanya bau rokok, jadi hampir sama aja sih sama di smoking-nya. Yang sama sekali nggak suka asep rokok akan lumayan terganggu. - Dan di sini gak jual sparkling water. - Playlist: Maudy Ayunda. Plus: - Affordable food & drinks.

If there is a way to understand why Korean grill is typically expensive for the commoners in Jakarta, this restaurant may well be providing lesson one. There is indeed a reason why someone needs to be skeptical to an all-you-can-eat Korean restaurant. While seems economical (AYCE for the price of about one portion of beef at a typical Korean restaurant), the meal is actually less appetizing. The taste is somewhat underwhelming, often imbalanced (too sweet, less savory), in general nothing special. Some items (especially ribs) are not available during lunch, which is outrageous. The restaurant itself does not provide any saving grace: looks a bit untidy, with uncooked items cornered instead of getting a center spotlight. Yes, economic-wise it may make certain sense, but do not go for the taste—for that, go to the real deal.
Kalo buat iseng"" berhadiah boleh. Tempatnya nyaman apalagi taman belakang cuma sofanya dikit. Pelayanannya goodlah sesuai sama harganya. Jangan berharap lebih. Cocok buat singgah sejenak.

Tempat makan ala Italia yang kaya menu, kecuali spaghetti (cuma ada tiga varian, blah). Interiornya suka, setengah retro setengah industrial. Cocok buat naracap karena pencayahaannya rada remang-remang hahaha. Harganya cukup asik di kantong, mendingan dibanding Warpas. Rasanya oke, tapi masih di bawah Warpas. Pelayanannya responsif dan cukup tanggap. Bolehlah untuk nongkrong lama-lama.

Salah satu martabak di ruko versailles bsd yang deket rumah. Kesan pertama disini, pelayannya jutek dah! Pesen martabak ukuran reguler coklat keju seharga 37 ribu. Rasanya biasa aja ahahaha manis dan susunya over menurutku. Tempatnya bersih sih, tertata rapi di ruko gitu, cuman ya itu biasa aja. Kalo disini ga ada tempat duduk jadi ya semuanya take away. Ohya walaupun di menu ada ukuran mini, jangan harap yg mini masih ada ya... Selamat mencoba aja deh!,saking banyaknya penjual martabak d dkt rumah, jd isenk pengen compare antara yg merk anu dan merk itu.. topingnya standar aj, martabak manis isi keju dan martabak 3 telur bebek. adonan martabak manisnya lbh tipis dibanding merk sebelah, rasanya agak manis, dan isi topingnya jg sedikit... krg puas deh klo makan martabak yg topingnya sdikit 😔 untung martabak telurnya enyak, potongan daging sapinya berasa, dan kuahnya jg pas rasa pedasnya

Loving the ambience here. Selain suasananya yg cozy dan kinda romantic, makanan disini jg enak dgn affordable price for italian resto. Butter sauce dan welcome breadnya enak dan variatif jg macemnya (ps: btw ternyata kita bisa minta lagi welcome breadnya😜) untuk main coursenya harus coba Ravioli De Ai Funghi, ravioli isi beef + mushroom dgn creamy sauce. Walaupun creamy tp sama sekali ga enek. For the dessert, my fav is Nero Crepes Mascarpone

Came here like months ago and always order Ikkudo's Tori Kara because it is spicy and i looooveeee spicy. When first time trying this i ordered the big portion and it was literally big portion for me (i was too hungry that i need to eat a lot LOL). I like the stock they made, and also the chicken and the noodle. All time fav, and it has the halal tag
Went this for lunch with my besties, love the ambience but asian cuisine sure not my type. We had the laksa, kwetiau and dessert but it just so-so i am not thinking to come back in the near future
Actually everything is so-so.... Nothing really special Only all the foods is really cute!!! Always busy, always have a long queue So far, I still like it And the price still ok for me :)

Penasaran kesini karna tempatnya lucu, bentuknya green bus, gitu bagus buat foto2, tp agak panas ruangannya 😣 Untuk makanan overall enak , lasagna nya sih recommend banget ada spinachnya dalemnya tomatnya berasa bgt dan spaghetti nya pedes banget ga nyangka sih sepedes itu terlalu banyak ladanya sampe gabisa dimakan 😯 trus psen juga nasi babi panggang gitu tp babinya keras dan kering banget dan rasanya biasa banget ,trus ada nasi ayam saos padang (untuk yg halal) lebih enak dripada nasi babi kalo menurutku walaupun tastenya biasa aja lebih kayak ayam saos asem manis

Great restaurant with really good food. Pizza is simple but tasty. The burger was great, perfectly cooked and seasoned, really good. And I definitely recommend the focaccia. Good service in the restaurant and you can have delivery as well (though I found that that it was a little cold) definitely recommend.

It's my first time visiting Colette & Lola at Grand Indonesia. The interior is very nice, lots of cute decorations hanging around, spacious, and also have a really comfortable atmosphere. I ordered 3 small cakes (forgot their names, my bad!) The Mike Wazowski from Monster Inc, one of the minions, and the panda cake. The taste is very delicious, especially the green one! (The monster) I don't really like the minion because it's too creamy since I'm not a huge fan of sweet stuff. The waiters are very nice and friendly. They helped us a lot, even helped me and my friends to take tons of pictures! The wifi is also very good and fast. Will definitely come back to try its macaroons!,colette&lola mah tempatnya pasti selalu bagus dan unik apalagi cahaya nya terang pas bgt deh kalo buat foto. cake nya juga semuanya enak dan unik2 gtu bentuknya, pokoknya puas lah berasa mau makan semua kuenya gituu. harganya juga standar kok;)

Kali pertama kesini, rencana doang mau makan disini tapi ngga jadi jadi, akhirnya karena ada acara traktiran ultah temen, well yaudah makan disini deh. Dateng kesini, suasana nya nyaman banget. Kata temen yg pernah ke Itali, furniture dan suasana nya hanpir mirip sama di Itali, kursi garis garis, ubin jalanan dan lampu jalan remang remang, well suasanya nya menyenangkan. Instagramable juga. Hihi Oke langsung dikasih menu sm mba mba nya, pengen nyobain salad nya, akhirnya liat menu salad yg ada logo chef recomended, namanya aga ribet ya. Intinya ada sekitar 5 slice salmon tipis sama beberapa daun. Yaaaa 6 kali caplok, habis. Main course nya, mesen beef steak yang (lagi) gue ga hafal namanya. Rasanya, enak! Porsinya, banyak! Sementara temen nyobain pork steak nya, komentarnya sama. Rasa, enak! Porsi, buanyak! Abis itu nyobain juga menu fav dan khas Itali, terong dipakein mozarela dll. Rasa, hmm gue si kurang suka ya. Benyek keju melting gimana gitu. Overall, endoooll

Lokasi ada di ruko yang sederetan dgn Alfamart dan Indomaret. Spesialnya tentunya Es Duren dan masakan Padang spt Sate Padang, Gado Gado. Es Duren ini menurut saya sangat manis. Kalau bisa less sweet sepertinya lebih enak. Satu porsi biasanya bisa untuk berdua. Sate Padang not bad walaupun porsinya kecil. Sementara Gado Gadonya tidak seperti gado gado padang dengan bumbu kacang khas. Gado-gado not recommended. Es Durennya maknyus!
Tempatnya luas, makanan nya enak, cocok di lidah, karena Indonesia banget. Yang menarik adl menu2 tambahan yang disediakan di masing2 meja..

Restoran Indonesia favorit saya dan suami, ini merupakan versi lebih classy dari Sate Khas Senayan.. Menu favorit kami adalah: nasi merah sambal roa, kepiting soka sambal mangga dan nasi uduk... Es cincaunya juga enak sekali.. yang kurang enak menurut saya surabinya, masih enakan surabi notosuman jauh..

Old school Chinese restaurant. Has that old world feeling from the 70s. Bump into tycoons past and present. Great food although a bit pricey. Attentive staff that has been there since my father's time. I will recommend the home made tofu, their house special squid, beef with Kailan, steamed scallops, angsio heepiow (fish maw) and last but not least their house special chicken soup. The food is always fresh and great.

Long time no see Goedkoop! Still good ambience, with a little change : now they have new smoking room. I still remember when first came here theres a piano, and its still there till today. I have brunch here. I order Classic Eggs Benedict and Hot Americano, my friend order Mac n Cheese and Ice Yakult Fruit Punch. My dish is what I like to see in internet photos : two crispy buns, salad on it, holandaise sauce, and egg. Yes I like it, and the coffee is also good. I also try my friend's mac n cheese, and we think it is so-so but not too bad. Over all I must admit I have a good brunch here, the price also good, the service good, good place and ambience. Thank u goedkoop, you keep this place still amazing for years!

Hore akhirnya sempet kesini nyobain makanannya! Gw pesen yang tempting banget d menunya yaitu cheese burger, basically layernya adalah onion ring, beef patty, sayurannya, dan cheese. Tp yg bkin tinggi adalah karena onion ringnya sendiri ada 3 tumpuk! Side dishesnya sperti biasa yaitu french fries dan salad, sauce nya tomato sauce sm mayonaise biasa. Harganya yg ini 55K cukup standart harganya! Tmen2 yg lain pesen blackjack sama angel hair with soka cravnya dan gw lupa cobin garagara keasikan foto makanannya. Buat minumannya gw pesen yg oreo gitu. Enak sih perpafuan oreo chocolate sama coffee gitu nyammmm. Bakal balik lg klo sempet

Hari sabtu kemarin saya dinner dgn my gf disini , pelayanannya ok dan cepat . Proses reservasinyapun mudah dan yg terpenting makanannya enak serta suasannya ok bgt buat dijadiin tempat dinner , mau kasih masukkan aja kalau bisa winenya datang sesudah makanan disajikan jgn sebelumnya : )

Tempatnya lucu banget😍 gak susah juga buat cari tempat wraps&rolls. Buat makanannya sih menunya masih kurang banyak, buat harga cukup terjangkaulah, pas sama rasanya. Tapi aku cobain minuman yg rasa peach kok kurang manis ya? Buah peachnya juga kurang segar sepertinya😕 Tempat duduk yg disediakan kurang banyak, kasian yg udah pesen makan harus naik turun cari tempat duduk, kalo bisa pake sistem waiting list aja sih. Overall buat tempatnya unik banget, lucu, bagus buat foto2, nyaman buat ngobrol lama2 sama temen2, tempatnya bersih juga😊

Ini pertama kalinya gue kesini dan tempatnya kecil di lantai 2 . Tapi jujur ini makanan vegetarian terenak yg pernah gue coba dengan harga yang ga mahal . Gue pesen Quarto Burger , Greenonigiri Platter , dan Raw strawberry cheese cake buat di share bareng temen . Yang paling gue suka greenonigiri nya enak banget dan next time pastinya bakal balik lagi .
Amazing place! Nice flavour of curry chicken rice! Thumbs up for that! 👌 and also for the gyoza, they newd some of flavout because the taste is weird tho..

Located by the road with spacious parking lot, it's easy for me to find and stop by the place. This place resembles me a lot of Bandar Jakarta (if you're a seafood lover and live in Jakarta, you must know this restaurant). The cookings taste delicious, you can pick the fish or any other seafood by size and type since they provide the fresh ones or if you don't know how to choose then you may as well pick whatever in the menu and they will help you to pick your preference. This place suits for family occasion since there's a baby chair as well and kids like to see the swimming fishes in the aquarium (well these fishes meant to be cooked though 😁). A note, don't forget to book the place if you're planning to go during lunch time. Good thing is, it's across the coffee shop (if you like to drink coffee after having lunch). Truthfully I enjoy Bandar Jakarta but it's too far (they have some branches but they good one is in Ancol, North Jakarta). Enjoy !

Sering banget kesini mungkin seminggu bisa 2-3 kali bahkan kalo bingung mau nongkrong mana ujung2nya ke chinmaya lagi chinmaya lagi.. the place is very great at the 2nd floor, sangat nyaman dan private.. antar meja diberi sekat sehingga terasa lebih private, dan itu yg membuat nyaman.. ada tatami room nya juga dan sudah saya coba, rasanya nyaman banget dan lebih private lagi.. ramennya enak, dessertnya juga, mau ngebir juga ada.. superb, very very recomended
Kalo pengen makan chinese food yg ramah dengan kantong ya kesini.. Semua makanannya lumayan enak.. Capcai, ikan tauco , ayam goreng madu nya.. Semuanya enak..
Go here and order hot coffee as it is better than cold ones. Pastry was a bit dry. Never go for the food. Poor quality and quantity though presentation was okay.

A new ramen joint in setiabudi... The broth is a bit oily... Taste okay... Chicken portion is not as much as i expected considering the price... But the pork portion i saw in the table next to me made me envy...,saya kebetulan pas kesini lagi ga terlalu pengen makan ramen, jd deh pesen chasiu pake nasi di hot bowl gitu. rasanya enak sih walaupun agak keasinan. terus daging porknya banyak cukup sampe suapan terakhir hehehe

Coffeeshop ini terletak di deretan Hero Terogong, Pondok Indah dan bersebelahan dengan Starbucks. Kesan pertama, agak berani juga ya bersaing dengan tetangganya coffeeshop yang terkenal. Tapi waktu saya datang, justru coffeeshop ini lebih banyak pengunjungnya daripada yang di sebelahnya. Tempatnya tidak terlalu besar, interiornya simple. Menu minuman dan snacks tertulis di papan tulis dengan ukuran besar. Kebetulan masih kenyang dan hanya mau ngopi saja, saya pesan Cappucino. Rasanya sih not bad untuk kopi Indonesia. Snacks yang ditawarkan tidak begitu banyak hanya ada beberapa brownies dan pastries saja. Belum sempat nyobain sih.

I ordered Spaghetti Seafood Aglio Olio and unfortunately the taste is not really satisfying. Their risotto is quite fine, a bit better than the Spaghetti Aglio Olio. Their complimentary appetizer, I think, is the best. HEHE 😅

Went here and had sop buntut (oxtail soup), ayam goreng yogya (fried chicken with crisps), tahu udang berontak (tofu with shrimp fillings), and kepiting soka mangga muda (softshell crab with mango). All of the food was nice but the kepiting soka and tahu berontak stood out for me. The quality of the food did not disappoint at all. The service is also top notch. It is pricey though in my opinion, but i went out of the restaurant with a happy tummy 😊

Beberapa hari lalu kesini pagi2. Penasaran aja di ajak temen. Lokasinya persis di sebelah food hall. Tempatnya ga terlalu besar, tapi design nya simple n cozy. Ada bbrp org asing dtg wkt it. Dekorasi berbau Belanda nya lumayan dapet. Karena ga rame, jadi enak buat nongkrong dan foto2. Pelayanannya lumayan bagus. Makanan ga terlalu lama keluarnya. Nyobain mac n cheese nya. Ga nyesel sih, kejunya enak juga. Fish n chip nya ya so so. Yang paling enak itu chicken creamy pesto spaghetti nya. Terakhir, nyobain poffertjes nya. Waktu itu rasanya ada yg agak kurang mateng. Overall ok lah.. Buat yg suka nongkrong di tmpt yg enak tpi ga terlalu rame, ini recommended
.. Miyagi TOP dech

Been here for several times i've been loving this place so much. The ambience is truly japanese izakaya dining. I suggest on making reservation especially on weekends. If you eat with many people (sharing) the price would be reasonable, however if you only eat for two the price might get a little high for izakaya. Though the foods are mostly great. Gotta try their gyutan, tsukune, jok galbi, kawa and other yakitori. Beer and sake is quite nice too. Cool place to hangout!

Ga ngerti lg... Hotdog home made ini enak binggo! Adanya di pasar santa lantai 1. Ngantri nya emang panjaaaaaaaaaaaang bgt dan sempet kena hold 2 x wkt saya kesitu. Tp buat makanan yg enak ini gapapa deh

Fachrizal Andriansyah Gak pernah bosen dan gak akan rugi deh dateng kesini.Dan sepertinya ini menjadi tempat favorit kita berdua, suasana yang enak, nyaman dan bersih, ditambah makanannya yg enak2 bikin betah menghabiskan waktu di sini
Salah satu tempat hits baru di sekitaran joglo. Menunya berbagai macam roti bakar dengan inovasi-inovasinya. Enak - enak kok roti bakarnya tapi ya gaada yang spesial sih ya.

Pesen Niku Udon tapi bukan yang porsi terbesar, lupa nama di menunya apa. Walau begitu ternyata lumayan kenyang juga. Kaldu kuahnya enak dan gurih, meski irisan dagingnya terasa agak ketipisan. Jumlah sayur per porsinya pas, nggak kurang kayak udon di tempat lain. Dengan rasa dan porsi segini, Niku Niku Udon layak banget buat dicob mengingat range harganya yang sedikit di bawah restoran udon lainnya.

Went here for lunch (located in Makan Sutra). karena belom permah nyoba jd penasaran dan akhirnya pesen kwetiau siram sapi:) nunggunya lumayan lamaa dan si pelayannya salah denger ""mineral water"" jadi ""es teh manis"" ??? Dimana letak kemiripannya..... Setelah lama nunggu, akhirnya muncul juga si kwetiau, porsinya besaar :0 daging sapinya ga begitu banyak, kuahnya banyak tapi cenderung encer, sayurnya banyak, dan kwetiaunya banyakk. Rasanya lumayan enakk kuahnya berasa (ditambahin kecap asin dikit) tapi kwetiaunya agak terlalu chewy dan ada yg masih berasa tepungnya.

Tempatnya sebenernya bagus dan unik. Tapi pelayanan menurut gue kurang. Waiternya ada yang kurang sopan, nadanya kurang sopan dan gue ngedenger kalau dia menyuruh temannya (sesama waiter) buat memberitahu pelanggan lain untuk pergi karna sudah mau close. Pdhl msh jam 9.11, dan close jam 10malem. Tolong untuk kesopanannya mas. Gue jd gabegitu respect dengan cafe ini.

I just tried this out of curiousity, at 1st I was sceptic about the food display size (which is super big) but I saw that they actually used the exact same size plates, and the food are also the same size as the display! :D I am impressed! The taste of the sweet and spicy chicken is okay, acceptable. Definetly good value for money. Will come back to try the super huge family portion.
Nicest all day bfast u can get in town. Best bacon. Everything at its best. Haha sounds a bit exaggerating, but thats how it is. Even the cookies and scone are awesome!
Fish & co and their new menu salted egg fish and shrimp is must try menu.. like fish & co before and like it more now. Fish and shrimp were very fresh Denny Setiawan

Akhirnya kesampean juga kesini... Ini tempat enak banget buat ngobrol, suasananya cozy banget... Harganya jg affordable. Dan makanan disini enak banget, pesen criise madam yang enak dan ngenyangin banget... Susunya yg salted caramel jg enaaaak. Dan satu lagi yg ga kalah enak, mie dreammealk itu enaaak jg... Bakal balik lg kesini....

The decoration of this place is so comfy. Their plating of food is so nice. So it looks so appetizing 1.spagetthi alio oglio(27k) The food is nice. The chicken is yummy. And the price is so affordable 2.caramba fries(35k) I really like the smoked chicken in this french fries. Definitely will buy this if i visit this restaurant And for the drinks i love their green apple tea(19k) Overall it really nice to hanging out w/ friends in here.But the parking lot is so full esp in the weekend because it's surrounded by some restaurant

I have visited this resto a few times before. This time i ordered beef curry rice and crispy chicken with carbonara sauce. The drinks were soda float and strawberry lychee soda. All tasted good and the portion was satisfying. However, the price was a bit pricey i think. Service was fast and corteous. Good ambience too.

Waktu itu lunch disini bareng teman kantor. Saya pesan BBQ ribs yang versi menu lunch. Cuma 2 tulang dan side dish nya sepi. Seingat saya cuma kentang pilihannya aja. Tapi rasanya enak bangeeeettt. Bumbu nya well marinated, meresap dan berasa bgt di dagingnya. Mashed potatonya juga juara. Sebelumnya kita pesan juga calamari dan mushroom untuk appetizer. Dua-duanya bikin ga bisa berenti. Enak bangetttt! Overall enaaak. I love this better than TGIF. Karena bumbunya lebih berasa (menurut saya TGIF agak lebih hambar sedikit).

Food : simple menu and had extraordinary taste of fried rice with chopped pork bacon, had big sausages and quiet strong flavor of bbq sauce. Service : explainable and need more time to serve all the food. Comfort : suit for family dine-in and big group.

Yang unik dari genki sushi adalah dia ga pake waiter buat nganterin makanan, tapi pake mobil2an yang uda ada jalurnya di samping meja makan kita. Jadi kita tinggal pesen pencet2 di ipad terus nanti makanannya dateng dianter pake mobil2an gitu. Karena jalurnya kecil, jadi porsi makanannya juga kecil2, dan harganya mahal, tapi rasanya enak. Jadi galau haha. Untuk yang mau cepet ya boleh lah ini, semacam fast food tapi sushi haha.

Tempat sih gabanget . Sempit dan lahan parkiran nggak ada sama sekali . Untuk kue cubit nya sih suka banget . Banyak varian rasa dan toppingnya . Ukuran kue nya juga ternyata lebih besar dibandingkan cubit cubit lain nya . Memang sih agak mahal kalo add topping nya banyak dan macem macem . Tapi enak kok . Untuk ice cloudy nya sih seger tapi biasa aja dan cuma diatasnya ada gulali yang disangkutin pake sedotan di gelas kita . Rasa gulalinya sih sama aja . Ga istimewa
PERFECTION With affordable prices. Always coming here for a nouveau dining experiences with heaven taste. These two items is a must try. buratta salad and tagliata with spinach. ❤️❤️

Fancy cargo-style food street serving halal foods which is inspired from the halal guys in NY. In a bowl, there are briyani rice (cooked in spicy sauce), added the choice of chicken/lamb or half-half. Better go with half-half so you can taste both of the chicken n lamb. Then, you gotta topped with white sauce (onion and yogurt) and bbq sauce, and don't forget the chilli sauce. I like the overall combination taste, its super delicious! I never taste something like that before, and it'll definitely gonna be my favorite place to eat.

Bad service dan ngga enak makanannya sangat tawar. Makanan yg sy pesan aglio olio chicken. Ngga rekomen sm tempat ini. Pelayananya buruk dan jutek (padahal keliahatannga ownernya yg melayani) yg bagian hitung2 uang dikasir. Omg sangat kecewa pdhal lg laper bgt.

Menurut saya disini makanan beratnya kurang enak ya, yang jadi juaranya adalah appetizernya. Dimsum semuanya enak, ada satu menu favorit saya adalah ""Leng Hong Kian"" perpaduan bakso udang goreng dan mayonaise nya enak bangeeeeeeeeet. harganya juga gak terlalu mahal

Udah beberapa minggu yang lalu ke spumante tapi baru sempet review skrg. Dari kemaren"" sih emang penasaran dengan spumante ini . Menurut saya konsepnya cukup unik karena half cafe half restaurant juga. Tempat nya nenurut saya cozy ya.. enak buat ngongkrong"" bareng temen atau ngerjain tugas. Decor tempat nya menurut saya unik dan menarik. Kali ini saya lebih memilih nge teh cantik :p. Disana banyak sekali cake"" dan menu main course. Cake yang saya pilih chocolate souffle cake dan untuk teh saya memilih mint tea. Untuk cake nya enak!! chocolate heaven bgt :3 base nya chocolate cake dan ada walnut nya, ditengah cake ada caramel dan di lapisan paling atas ada chocolate ganache , recommended! :3. Untuk teh nya ada rasa mint"" nya cukup fresh sih. Overall nongkrong di sini cukup memuaskan , pelayanan nya juga nice ,waktu itu saya juga take away quiche dan rasa nya juga enak. Next bakal balik lagi buat coba main course nya :3.

Penasaran sama cafe yang satu ini . Sebelumnya gw baca reviewnya dulu di sini . Kebanyakan kurang puas sama makanannya . Ya udah gw pesen minumannya . Dari segi interior ya mayanlah ya comic banget , tempatnya luas , liat cover menunya juga comic tapi ko menu2nya biasa aja ya , kurang greget gitu . Gw pesen minuman aja , Ice Greentea Latte . Rasanya terlalu manis dan gelasnya kurang bersih . Service pelayannya kurang cepat buat yg area luar . Pelayannya juga kurang ramah , jutek2 mukanya . Need more improvement !

The best jajangmyun in the town!!! Rasanya pas! Banyak 1 porsi banyak bgt bsa buat dua orang ubi manisnya enaknya pake banget ngalahin yang lain dan juga suasana tempatnya yang enak dan privat! Hehehe,jajangmyeonnya enak! Kacang kedelainya pas, bumbunya juga pas tidak terlalu pekat. mandu goreng nya juga enak, sebagai pelengkap wajib jajangmyeon. There must be a reason to go back here again & again!

Cozy place but sorry, not the food. Or did I order the wrong ones? Mesen Omelette with Ham and Tomato, rasanya biasa banget, side saladnya juga standard aja rasanya, dan dengan harga IDR 70,000 hmmm rada nyesek juga ya. Then it's my first time nyobain Cannelle, not my kind of food, kemanisan. Kalo untuk ambiencenya gw suka, cozy banget, didominasi dengan warna putih dan biru, dan gw paling suka duduk di kursi gantungnya, enak banget buat leyeh-leyeh hihihi

This is the kind of place where you wouldn't wanna leave and wish to stay forever. The comfy and homey atmosphere completing the nice coffee and cakes. I tried the espresso and hot cappuccino, both of them suit my likings well. This cafe is a steal. Especially if you need a sanctuary in the middle of the city's hustle. No smoking area anyway, which is a good thing for a coffee shop imho.

Pretty excited when I heard that tanamera coffee roastery opens at Pacific Place. I went there to meet up with my friends on Sunday morning. It is not located inside the mall, a bit more on the backside of PP, so you have to walk a bit from outside PP to find this coffee shop. I ordered hot latte (IDR 38,5k incl. tax), my friends ordered cold brew and TC iced caramel latte. Both are good, tanamera's coffee is strong even when you order latte but I like the ""no acid aftertaste"" hehe.. The iced caramel latte is nice since my friend asked the barista to add more caramel and less coffee. Cold brew just so-so. The place is decoratred with Tanamera style, black walls and a bit of red color accent. Quite cozy and great place too. Electrical socket available, wifi also available but it requires you to sign up first which took my time quite much so i choose not to use their wifi.

Good Toasted Sub Restaurant :) Makanan yang disajikan selain toasted subs, juga ada pizza.. Range harga yang ditawarkan mulai 40rb-135rb dan dapat ditambah paket minum dan kentang (@20rb).. Pesanan ku Steak & Swiss, isi nya bawang bombai, swiss cheese dan steak.. recomended ditambahkan dengan kentang waffle nya :D selamat mencoba :) Food : 4/5 Price 4/5 Ambience 3.5/5
Tempat nya cozy, popcorn chicken nya enak bumbunya kerasa pas cuma agak overprice ya krn porsi sedikit. Well next time, akan kesini lg untuk ngopi-ngopi sore.

Location: 8/10 (In Tribeca Park. A bit of walk if you use the parking building) Ambience: 6/10 (It is not well designed. Pretty comfy though. No music) Food: 7/10 (Ordered the Nasi Sapo Ayam and Ikan Dori Saus Serbafood. Nasi Sapo Ayam is just a so so but considering it is a healthy food the taste is not bad- no msg. The dory fish is well cooked and it caters to my taste) Drinks: 8/10 (Ordered An Xi Guan Yin Tea which is awesome since it is a special drink and not many restaurants serve this. The tea is very relaxing indeed) Service: 7/10 (Service was okay. Did ask for the wifi password and the server said it didnt have but in fact it asked for one)

Lebih ke presentasi yg menarik aja utk penyajian es krim nya mnurut gw..rasa es krim nya standard sprti tmpt2 lain. Kali ini nyoba smoky pan yg bold sama ferrero waffle nya. Yg bold ini rasa es krim nya emang bold,cenderung ke asem seger..enak..klo ferrero nya psti enak lah,secara coklat ferrero nya aja rasanya udh enak. Kbtulan utk ferrero nya lg harga promo (dlm rangka one year anniv of north pole).

First time kesini, lumayan tempatnya cozy apalagi buat anak kecil dan dipisah smoking area sama non smoking area. Ada live music juga jadi gak ngebosenin. Gua pesen banana split, spicy noodle dan ice cream orion candy dannnn.... rasanya fantastik banget, enak2 trus ice cream orion candy nya lucu, harganya juga standard. Pokoknya recommended!

Seroeni seems like an exclusive place for dining. But the food is not as ""expensive"" as it looks. Even though the drinks prices are 5 star hotel price level, but the food are priced fairly normal. As you enter the resto, the waiter will asked you, under what name the table it will be as she walked you to your table. The ambience was superb, fine peranakan style, very cozy, you will feel super comfortable even just to sit there for hours... But out of my expectation, the food are just so so.... not that they are bad, they are just standard, nothing extra ordinary, probably my expectation was too high looking at the place as fine like that. As for the price, they are reasonably expensive but still acceptable, for that standard of restaurant quality. 1 thing that impressed me a lot, The waiter greet you by name as they Thanked you on your way out, leaving the restaurant.
Hands down to this place! The taste was SUPERB! So in love with the broth and the meat. I love the taste of their noodle too. Love you to the fullest!
Tempatnya cozy banget , sore sore kesini enak deh. Makananannya enak tp harganya mahal hehe . Maybe jual view yaaah. banyak ikan di emapangnya. Cocok buat bawa keluarga kesini . Pelayananya lama :(

I'd raise two thumbs up for The Works if I wasn't busy using two hands at once to shove down that goodness into my mouth. Sour cream, cream cheese, and bacon bits were in perfect harmony. Yet it was hard to say the same about the burger. A friend did an excellent hardselling on their ribs burger, so I decided to prove it myself. The rib burger was juicy and tender, I love the sauce as well. Lambada burger (ground lamb with cheese) was below expectation, patty was too thin and underseasoned, it tasted exactly like beef for me. And I personally thought that their burgers were too overpriced, considering that they were served without any side dishes. I wouldn't mind paying extra for some additional fries or salad, because the burger itself looked so pitiful and lonely.,love love love the chips! and always love the steak also. nice ambience to chat and enjoy the food.
The first kesini , kurang enak ternyata dessert nya tapi tempat nya nyaman kok pelayanan nya ya lumayan ramah lah hehe . Wifi nya jg kenceng hehe .

Iseng2 nyoba tempat makan ini karena penasaran. Saya pesen kimchi jigae, jujur syokk pas liat penyajiannya ga indah sama sekali, dengan mangkuk besar dan kuah yg hampir luber berasa pesen makanan betawi bukan makanan korea. Dari segi rasapun biasa banget.. Dari pengalaman itu jd gak mau nyoba2 ksini lg :|

Tempe,lalap,plus sambel),paket gurame bakar (nasi,gurame,sayur asem,lalap,plus sambel),dan minumnya gw pesan es rembulan. Tadinya pngn coba rawon buntut goreng tp kosong ktnya. Empalnya enak..empuk dan bumbunya pas. Sayur asemnya kuahnya pas tp isinya cm labu doang sygnya. Sambelnya pke terasi dan gk ada pedas2nya. Guramenya bumbunya brasa smp ke dlm..bakarnya sprtinya bnyk kecapnya krn manis. Es rembulannya seger..asemnya mantap!!! Lumayan lah buat makan siang." Melayani dine in dan delivery

This is a must visit for everyone who misses Nando's! Of course it's not a carbon copy but hey it will cure your Nando's sickness ;) I had peri peri rice chicken, salad and cream soup. Overall the meals were tasty. They even put a tad too much peri peri sauce in the rice and salad dressing, at least to my taste (I ordered the dressing on the side). But glad they are not skimping on it!

I would say that this is the best shabu shabu ive ever tried so far. They have the best szechuan soup! And the original soup is good as well. Szechuan soup contain lots of herbs and tasted rich, kinda like indomie. Be careful thou while sippin' your szechuan soup there is this little herbs i don't know what it is that taste weird when u bite them, a lil bit sour n spicy i think i cant really explain the flavor. The meat are very tender, i dont usually like having meat while having shabu shabu but i just have an exception for the meat here. They offer ala carte and buffet for around 160k++. This place is worth trying especially in cold rainy day.

This place is definitely my new fav hang out spot in Jakarta! I LOVE places with patio/terrace space and this one meets all the criterias to be on my top list. The ambience, the atmosphere and more to add is the city skyline view (sunset), just gorgeous. Best to come here with your group of friends, you can def enjoy some good laughs with good view. The place itself is in DeRitz Building (which looks abondened) from the outside and is a bit hidden. The food in my opinion was average, though I wasn't able to try many dishes since I went there more for afternoon tea. Their gazpacho was a little off for my liking, but their strawberry drink was yummy. On average you'll be looking at paying anywhere from 150-250 for two people dining (no alcohol drinks). I would come back here to try their meat selection:)

All-time favorite for decent Sundanese foods in Bogor, with other choosings of Indonesian specialties. Spacious place, a mixture of saung and modern sit-on chairs restaurant. Suitable for family gatherings. Recommended menu including its Paket Nasi Timbel, oxtail soup and daun jahe.

Strict to the point, IT WAS SUPERB RECOMMENDED! Especially, if you're such a porky hunter (like me). Furthermore, the price was worth enough, also! Hahahah! So, to short the long words, just try dudes!👏🏻

Enak buat nyantai apalagi duduk di balkonnya yang bisa ngeliat langsung ke panggung, jadi dobel enaknya. Pelayanannya juga ramah banget. Lumayan banyak pilihan kopi disini, trus nyobain Es Kopi Susu rasanya pas dan enak. Roti Bakar nya juara, isiannya nggak pelit dan rotinya garing banget. Abis itu juga mesen Kwetiau Goreng tapi kurang sip. Rekomen banget buat dateng kesini apalagi malem minggu karena rutin ada penampilan musik.

Kesininya pas pulang kantor jadi pas banget lg rame ramenya. Gw ngerasa bner2 di coffee shop dengan banyak banget org yang ngobrol dan suasana yang cozy bgt. Gw duduknya di tingkat paling atas karena emang gw sukanya tempat yang rada sepi. Overall tempatnya asik dan cozy

Great, a lot of choices and not too expensive. I recommend you to try this restaurant, the foods are amazing, some of them might be spicy, but most of them are not. But the best for me is the sweet pork. 😀

Had coco few days ago, simply because I feel like I have to try an artisanal bubble tea that I never tried before, and I also heard several words that coco is better than any other well known artisanal bubble tea. My order was the salty cocoa which taste worse, I dont know whether I made mistaken choice or what, but somewhat I feel like the other salty cream flavor at s***e t*a was not taste like the one I had at coco. At coco, the chcolate was too thick, and it leaves bad aftertaste in my throat. I dont try their other flavors tho, perhaps others maybe great, but mine was worse. And yes, until now, d*k** still being my favorite artisanal bubble tea.

Ordered Wakame Salad (seaweed salad), Milu Katsu hotplate with cheese (pork cutlet), Tontoki (pork confit Japanese style), Gyu Tan Don set, Tori Ramen with Mini Chahan set (chicken ramen with garlic fried rice), Buta Bara kushiyaki (pork) and Gyutan thin kushiyaki (ox tongue thinly sliced). The kushiyakis were good, the katsu was also nice. The only downfall was the rice on the Gyu Tan don rice, I don't know what went wrong with it, may be they use non japanese rice or they cook the rice without japanese rice-cooker? Something just not right, the rice was dry and stale, it ruined the taste of the gyu tan. Hopefully the kitchen could make some improvement on the rice or may be I just come on the wrong time? Other than the rice, the rest of the food were excellent 👌and i loved the pudding on the complimentary dessert.
Nyobain hainam & bebek panggang dan bulir jagung telur asin. Enak banget. service ok. Cuma buat staff yg di dapur, kalo nyanyi jgn keras2 sampai terdengar ke luar dapur
Better than i expected, great taste & big portion (the portion is for 2 Indonesian person, for 1 if the person is really hungry). But didnt really like the place, so we only take away.

Hidden gem di senayan. Coffee Cup by Cherie ini instagramable banget. Kalo liat di akun instagramnya, bikin pengen ke sini karena emang bagus di foto. Pas sampai sini ternyata tempatnya kecil tapi lucu sih. Menu yang diincer di sini itu watermelon cake karena unik dan penasaran juga sama rasanya. Namun sungguh disayangkan, watermelon cake nya habis pas saya pesan😭 akhirnya cuma ngopi-ngopi aja deh. Saya pesan red velvet latte yang hot. Art coffee nya cute banget, gambar beruang. Jadi sayang buat di minum😂. Setelah di coba, rasa red velvetnya nendang. Enggak terlalu manis juga. Wajib banget ke sini buat coba watermelon cake nya.

Tempat yang cocok buat kongkow bareng temen2. Tema tempatnya jaman dulu gitu, enak suasananya buat ngobrol bareng temen2 apalagi abis ujan ngopi wkwk. Harganya juga murah bangett, saya pesan kopi hitam toraja harganya 7k ada makanannya jg yg lain khas nusantara. Tempatnya juga gampang dicari, disamping jalan soalnya. "Kalo suka jajanan pasar seperti kolak dan teman teman sejenis nya, wajib kemari. Dijamin akan balik lagi, nagih, hehehe. Yang penting juga selain rasanya mantap, harganya juga ramah di kantong. Yang rekomendasi singkong thai, kolak pisang, bubur mutiara (dng talas), biji salak, bugis mandi. Selain itu tersedia juga kue-kue seperti talam, risoles, gorengan. And sekarang ditambah bakso sapi dan es cendol. Mantap. If you have a hankering for traditional finger foods such as kolak and cs, Kue Pontianak Lina is a must. And you have been warned of higher possibility of getting hooked indefinitely, hehehe, not only by the taste but also by the affordable price. Please come by and try their thai cassava, kolak banana, pearl porridge (with taro), sweet potatoes porridge, and bugis mandi. Also available a platter of pastries including risoles, croquette, pastel, etc. And now it also offers meatball soup and ice cendol. Bravo

This is the first time i come here. Delicious food and the size of the foods are quite big. But unfortunately this place has slow wifi and sometimes the wifi disappeared. For the price is cheaper than fish and co hehe

Tempat seafood didaerah tebet ini, menurut gue rasanya lumayan & harganya juga ngga terlalu mahal. Disini gue memesan : 1. Cumi goreng tepung : disini potongan cuminya itu besar2 banget , potongan cumi besar dibalut dengan tepung yang banyak. Krn potongan cuminya gede jadi gue ngga terlalu suka huhu 2. Kerang hijau saus padang : kl kerang hijau saus padangnya enak bgt rasa sem pedas gurih nya pas, apalagi rasa bawangnya berasa bgt 3. Ikan baronang bakar : krn gue ngga terlalu suka ikan jadi gue hanya bisa bilang ikannya ya bisa dikatakan lumayan enak

I'm absolutely joyful that PB opens here in Plaza Festival! Real Italian Pizza, So Close! Love everything here. Ordered Margherita with freshly sprinkled Basil which had me at Hello! and this little hand just can't wait to grab one of the Fungi with Extra Jalapeño. This will be our most favorite Pizza place!

Ayam monyet ini berlokasi di depan banget kampus tercinta haha (UPN) Gak sering banget kesini, tapi ya pernah beberapa lah kesini .. Disini unik, jadi kita bisa pilih sambal sesuka hati.. Wktu itu pas kesana aku pesen amon terus ambil beberapa sambel, menurut aku sih enak dan pedes. Cuma kenapa hampir disemua sambel banyak minyaknya >
Tempatnya agak panas tp lumayan di tgh2 kober sini, makanannya enak dan lumayan murah. Thai tea nya enaak, lain kali mau nyobain mie nya kyknya enak liat org2

The quiet star here is the fresh pasta. We had the Pappardelle con Ragu - creamy & comforting - and Tagliatelle con Polpette - juicy meatballs with cheesy centre. Excellent bread! We had the crostini with this dry aged beef as starters, much better than the seafood platter. Blackberry torta was much better than Panna Cotta as I found the latter too cloying and sweet. I found the crowd somewhat annoying with young brides celebrating their bridal shower or young wannabe ladies-who-lunch. So I would suggest grabbing a seat closer to the front of the restaurant and avoiding the patio area.

To be honest, I am not really a cake person but, this bakery needs tons of attention guys. They make a great cakes like brownies and stuff. It is located near the intersection of ciledug raya and H. Mencong street. Although they do not have a large parking area, but surely, people coming like a flies searching for a food. And I do not know why, but every time I came here, they always serve warm cakes, I mean cakes like brownies needs to take like 1 hour baking to make, and it seems like they always bake a new one every hour, so yeah they really have tons of customers hungry for cakes. My favorite, the dry brownies, and still warm of course. It cost like 30,000 IDR and in my opinion for cakes like this, in other bakery, they will be like 80,000 IDR. But for real, they have the best cakes in town. So make sure you guys come here to taste the be sweets even though its outside of Jakarta and 4/5 is the right rate for this bakery.
Porsi beef nya kurang banyak wkwk tapi ini top banget, tom yam nya endessss lah pokonya . Harga bersahabat, porsi tomyam nya banyak cuma beef nya aja kurang hihi
Tempat yg cozy buat ngopi-ngopi cantik,,trus jg ada ice cream khas dr italy (gelato) dengan banyak macem pilihan rasa,,cocok bgt buat anak otomotif,,dengan konsep otomotifnya

Taro layer cake. Combined with bold flavors such as cheese, green tea, durian, and i dont know what else. Too many flavors are offered, but not all of them are available everyday. I personally love the cake, as it is super moist and not too dense. Size and price are also within my reasonable range, it being less than IDR 40k and all. Good for sharing. The queue might seem to give you a headache, but it actually moves pretty fast.

Had: * Funghi and seafood soup served with 2 sticks of bread: very good soup with prawn, fish, sliced squids: Rp 95K * Seafood Ravioli: i feel tehe edge was quite hard and starchy so I tossed them away :)) and only ate the middle part with fillings: Rp 130K * Fresh orange juice without ice: superb, sugar was less and rational * Mineral water * Table comes with bread; a bit hard and dry but tasty No desert this time. Asked for Affogato but none. Waiter does not seems to know what he's offering: I asked what's inside the funghi and seafood soup he seemed to be confuse For western guests, this restaurant is classified probably 4.5 to 5 our of 5. For Asian taste still the seasoning is too mild Cheers all...
Nyobain ""burger for god"" kata nya sih recomended Tapi ternyara Ga sesuai ekspetasi Daging nya hambar Ada burnt nya Biasa aja ga sesuai seperti orang2 bilang

Vibe cafenya enak banget buat berlama2 ngobrol ataupun wifian.. makanannya juga seru buat brunch, saya sendiri pesen classic++ yaitu sandwich dgn fillingnya smoked beef, mushroom, onion, tomato dan yg paling penting melted cheesenya.. buat minuman saya order ice green tea latte, hmm rasanya standard.. mudah2an sih variasi menunya bisa lebih banyak lagi yaa.. kayanya akan dateng lagi buat nyobain katsu don atau pastanya :)

Penasaran coba, akhirnya beli pakai gojek. Martabak telornya standard, kurang asin, cenderung tawar, untung kebantu dengan saus kecap pedasnya. Martabak manisnya ga terlalu berminyak seperti martabak pd umumnya, jd ga berasa terlalu guilty waktu makan, untuk rasa standard aja

Okay. The taste so so badly! High prices too! Just in case they serves 55k-65k each cake. Too pricy but the tastes are bad! Really bad. Sorry but I tell the truth. Cute cakes perfect place. The heavy chocolate it's like mud cake... Ah so disappointed!!

They are my fave noodle house since 90s. Their pork noodle is really good, including the pork meat ball Whenever i am around Hayam Wuruk, i will try to visit them. But need to prepare extra money since their price is quite high,yang enak cuma bakso gorengnya. bakmi komplit dan bakmi masaknya kaga enak sama sekaleeee eneg makannya hueek. bakmi masaknya lama bgt dtgnya, uda gitu pas dtg kayak abis diutak atik sm org laen gitu soalnya daun bawangnya uda dipinggirin gitu, eh pas minta ganti ke abangnya, itu daun bawang cuma diambilin doang. kan ngeselin. huf! harganya juga rada mahal dgn rasa eneg itu huh

Ini tempat G.I.L.A!! Memenuhi hasrat karnivora gua bgt. Murah, enak, banyak! Pilihan menunya banyak. Harga di bawah 15ribu semua. Rasa gamain2. Pilihan sauce banyak. Antrian lumayan, tp pelayanannya cepet bgt Pelayanan: 4/5 Harga: 4.5/5 Rasa: 4/5 Kebersihan: 3.5/5 Recomended! (kesukaan gua sosis, lobster, udang, sama semua dumplingnya gitu)

Tempatnya keren, suasananya menyenangkan dan snacknya enak! Sayang saya nggak sempat mencoba main coursenya karena pas ke sana masih kenyang. Coffee creme brulee-nya bikin agak mixed feeling. Lapisan creme brulee di atasnya enak, sweet & crispy like it should be. Tapi pas sampai menghirup kopinya, agak keenceran. Mereka juga menyediakan aneka varian teh. Dan saya mencicip hot Morroccan mint green tea yang segar.

Rasanya agak aneh, gak familiar. Udonnya kenyal, kuahnya enak tapi agak aneh. Mereka masaknya by order. Makanya pas pesen lamaaaa banget datengnya. Berhubung mall lagi rame juga, jadi kita gak dapet tempat, terpakss nunggu orang dulu. Setelah dapet tempat kosong masih nunggu juga. Akhirnya gak lama udah jadi. Btw, kita yg ngambil kesana. Bukan di anter ke meja.

Berawal liat promonya yaitu beli salim ice bisa dapet free thai ice, dikarenakan lokasinya yang berada di eat n eat maka diwajibkan untuk isi kartu terlebih dahulu... Salim ice adalah es serut dengan sirup merah (kyknya sih cocopandan) dengan 4 pilihan topping, yaitu barley, selasih, jelly coco, jelly coffee, longan, lychee, kacang merah, sagu mutiara dll.. Yang gw pilih jelly coco, longan, sagu mutiara dan kacang merah.. Rasanya lumayan seger dan harganya juga lumayan murah apalagi ditambah bonus thai tea.. Untuk thaitea nya sebenarnya enak, tapi pas gw pesen esnya banyak bgt jadi manisnya kurang berasa (namanya jg gratisan) but overall rasanya enak.. Foodraider result: dengan harga yang mirip2 dengan counter minum sesama foodcourt, tango thai worth buat dicoba..
Tempatnya asik banget untuk nongkrong lama - lama. Creamson crush nya seger banget. Suasananya enjoy banget. Very recommended. Oh, they got great music playlist too.

One of the best japanese restaurants in town in my opinion. Besides their dated interior the foods were great and very authentic. I just love all the food i ordered. Their service was nice. Will definitely come back here for sure.
Been there yesterday for my late Christmas lunch. I Love the ambience. Love the services from them. Such a lovely venue to have lunch or dinner with some friends and family.

Pagi2 ke senopati belom ada cafe buka akhirnya mampir kesini!!! Konsepnya mirip bucks tapi tempatnya sih pewe and cozy banget uda gitu ada outdoor juga!! Waktu kesini pesen coffeenya enak kok lebi kerasa juga kopinya daripada susunya goodjob!! Croissant nya enakkkk top bangettt Sconesnya juga oke gk terlalu manis Next mau coba cakenya penasaran sihh,nice ambience with great view especially when evening. its light also nice. with warming services from staff and quickly clean and wipe the table. but unfortunately its so full so that hard to take nice photos
Tempatny lucu unyu2 gt si haha ala2 bineka beruang gt ya interiorny tp menurutku terlalu banyak hiasan ny jd keliatam ribet gt ya hhe untuk makanan standart si

Decided to visit kkludak after read some reviews in zomato...was exciting when finally i found this place in GI...we waited for bout 20mins till our spicy chicken honey ready..ok..their specialitty is chicken honey..CHICKEN..but i was struggling to taste or find the chicken in my cup..i only can taste the crispy flour covered with honey n spices..seriously guys...WHERE IS THE CHICKEN???? also its not really crispy but almost hard like a rock..my jaws really tired eating this food...fiiiuuuhhh...really dont understand why so many people come to this place..

Always be our favorite coffee. Mine is Asian Dulce Latte. What is yours? I also love to collect their tumbler for special occasion such us valentine, easter, christmas and many more!,starbucks coffe is the best mixture of happiness and everything else good in life. Although my favourite drink is the cotton candy and the green tea frapp. I also love the food that is being served. it's beyound amazinly delicious and im not only talking about this starbucks outlet im talking for everything, every single starbucks outlet in every city and country

Lumayan sering kesini, tempatnya sebenernya enak.. Tapi keciiill. Kalo dtg maleman dikit pasti ga akan dpt tempat. Dan sumpeknya kebangetan :( Biasanya sih klo lagi niat saya dtg jam 7 biar dpt tempat. Untuk minumannya relatif terjangkau. Biasanya saya pesen Yellow Submarine yg pint dan bir. Untuk makanannya lumayan kok.. French friesnya enak, trus biasanya klo lagi bareng temen2 pasti pesen tahu gorengnya.. Dijamin abis makan itu pulangnya sober broh! Hahahaha

Resto yang bisa dijadikan buat tempat nongkrong bersama teman dan sanak saudara. Makanan yang saya coba spagheti rawon lumayan, 7,5/10. Minumannya juga menyegarkan. Wifi kencent tapi sayangnya tempatnya rame banget, jadi buat yang mau serius mengerjakan tugas kuliah atau kantor agak sulit untuk berkonsentrasi. Tapi untuk keseluruhan tempatnya asik.

Rasanya enak bagi yg suka asin, dan dari semua ramen yg kumakan, ini sebenernya bukan ramen, tapi rasanya lebih mirip lomie berkuah encer... Meski mirip lomie, tapi aku suka rasanya... "Sbenernya ngrating soto ini di outlet ini, cuma nunut tempat ajah. Coz aslinya. Saya makannya yang di outlet depan perumahan saya. Mencari cari soto dan soup tulang sum sum keren lewat mbah google. Nemunya ini, unik sum sumnya kluar dari tulang. Ngejar2 sampe ke mangga besar, taunya ada di alam sutra di LW Mall. Nyari-nyari sum sum nda pernah ada. Laaaaaa, ternyata depan rumah ada outletnya! Udah 4 taun pula bukanya. Astagaaa, mata ni mata ke mana aja. Di sini, apapun daging dan SUM SUM mlimpah! Hehehehe. Dan segi rasa. Waah...josssten deh. Tolong dong, porsi dibesarin dikit lagi. Price sgitu lo. Tambah lagi porsi. Silaken kalo mau nemu sum sum yang pasti ada jelas, ke outlet depan rumah saya aja. Di seberang sektor 1A , Gading Serpong. Jangan salah twmpat yah! Ada 2 soto betawi di seberang sektor saya kayaknya. Yang mangga besar

The place is reminiscent of the good old days... they have a corner where they sell old fashioned toys and snacks. The dinnerware is also your grandmother's style dinnerware. The food? It's good and reasonably priced. The bihun goreng cabe rawit is our favorite!

Tempatnya mungil tp nyaman banget. Karena warnanya unyuu. Disini paling suka pesen lemongrass chicken steak enak banget 5/5 mash and bangersnya juga lumayannn cheesenya berasa banget 4/5 kalo the volcanonya sih standart biasa aja 3/5 tp secara keseluruhan tmpat ini worth it buat di coba

For me, this is the BEST lapo in town !!! Babi panggangnya juara. Bumbunya meresap smp ke dalem. Babi gorengnya super crispy. Dan saksangnya juga enakkk bangett. Sambalnya juga juara. Semuanya enakk disini. Buka sampe sore tapi kalo bisa jgn datang tlalu sore krn bisa aja udah keabisan. Ps: hari minggu LIBUR.

Jadi lagi jalan jalan ke tanjung duren, ke jajaran makanan makanan. berhubung laper dan masih pagi banget berusaha cari makanan yang buka gt kan (yaa paginya gue jam 11 sih h e h e ). nah ya terus lewat bakso solo kan. hal pertama yang gue notice adalah baunya enak banget 👌🏻✨ bau bau surga gt. terus akhirnya nyoba nih mesen. surprisingly cepet banget keluarnya! bener bener cepet banget dan makanannya masih panas enak gitu sedap sedap apalagi cakung hoho. nah udah gt gue pesen bakso biasa ceritanya mau nyobain. baksonya enak, kuahnya enak dan ga terlalu bening jadi ga tawar. mi kuningnya juga enak, gendut gendut gitu. sambelnya mantepp banget dannn dan dan setiap mesen kan dapet pangsit goreng tuh satu. GEDE BANGET HAHA dan crispy tebel. pokoknya enak deh 👌🏻✨ mantap dan kenyang.

Lumayan ada tempat asik sambil nunggu jadwal kreta. Menu warung roti bakar jalanan di kemas secara modern. Roti bakar dengan toping nuttela, oreo, kit kat, greentea dan marshmallow nya enak.Indomi nya pun jadi beda rasanya karena di masak dengan kuah susu dan keju, ada toping telur goreng dan kikil pedas (menurut saya kikil ini tidak match dengan mi kejunya). Seeprtinya kikil pedas jadi menu ciri khas dr warung ini, karena saya lihat bnyknya menu yg menggunakan si kikil ini. Minuman ada smoothies, tea yakukt yg lumayan segar. Design tempatnya unik, namun sayang sekali ruangan kurang luas karena hanya memakai satu ruko kecil saja jadi ruangan panas walau menggunakan ac

Dulu dulu ramen ini luarbiasa...tp sekarang entah kenapa jadi biasa aja...quality nya turun rasa nya kurang dan lebih maksud nya bisa terlalu asin dan bisa hambar...trus di perparah sama pelayanan nya...terlalu banyak pelayannya dan ngobrol aja kg cepat tanggap jg...sayang sekali

Too much love with their cupcakes in 1 bite.. really really like and wanna eat more and more.. Rasanya yg ga tll manis bikin ga enek. Creamcheesenya jgn nagih smpe titik terakhir Sempet beli yg blueberry juga , itu di dlm cakenya ada buah blueberry kecil2nya .. Antara cake , cream and fillingnya bikin so much fun when eat all of them. I guarantee u can't just eat only 1

Karena lagii pengen ngebiir aja, akhirnya miliih dateng kesinii. Lumayan kalo cuma pengen duduk santaii sambil ngobrol, sangat ga merekomendasikan makan disiini, kurang enak aja siih menurut gue. Ada live music juga. Sayangnya, panas banget, karena cuma pake kipas angiin..

Don't know what special with this place but always be the first option for late night eats 24hours (near to my house tho). Even service is underrated, this place always crowded. Try the nasi goreng seafood balacan and bakmi pangsit.

I think this place brings up similar concept like the one i saw at clark quay singapore. Unique place with the hospital concept. Thumbs up for their unique concept but for the food, seriously need improvements, most of the food that i ordered were sold out. So i finally only ate pizza, dessert and their unique mocktails. Pizza taste good, dessert just okay. Seriously needs improvement.

One of my favourite places to go that sells Mexican food. The place is pretty cozy although it needs more light at night. On the food side, their quesadillas are awesome but the best of all is their Taco Lengua. If I'm not mistaken lengua means tongue in Mexican, so it's a tongue taco basically and it tastes superrrrb. I love everything they have in the menu that includes lengua. Their tortas are also yummy and big, which is great. The only thing that makes me like this less is the fact that it's becoming more and more expensive each time I visit. So I don't go there very often anymore since I've found some cheaper replacements. But it's still one of my favourites tho! PS: if you're a muslim, when ordering taco lengua ask for no bacon bits! hahaha

Tempatnya gak di jatinegaranya banget sih...jauh dari Jatinegara menurut saya... Bebeknya empuk banget bumbunya enak dan kerasa banget.. Rame banget tempatnya juga terbatas dan panas, tapi bebeknya beda dari bebek yg lainnya..

Pelayanannya nggak cekatan dan nggak menulis orderan dg baik. Ramahpun tidak. Es coffee nya standar banget rasanya enakan kopi dipinggir jalan. Ambience cafe yes okay. Makan so standar :( not recommended

Udah dua kali kesini dan so far so good. Awalnya penasaran karena tempatnya ramai terus, makanya cobain sendiri dan ternyata emang worth to try lah. Menu favorit yang saya pesan itu mie aceh goreng telur dan seafood. Rasa rempahnya kerasa dan aceh banget. Tapi sayangnya mie tumis mereka ngga terlalu enak kayak gorengnya, terlalu banyak kuah dan agak hambar gitu. Untuk minum, saya suka banget sama kopi tariknya mereka. Sooo tasty! Mau yang panas atau dingin, sama-sama enak. Untuk tempat sebenernya standar sih, ada indoor dan outdoor. Saya paling suka di outdoor yang depanan sama tempat bikin teh/kopi tariknya. Jadi sambil makan bisa liat langsung cara buat minumannya hehe. Price 4/5 Taste 4/5 Vibe 3/5 Service 3/5
Bertempat di The Breeze, mall yang berkonsep nature. The Fool salah satu resto yang cozy buat hangout bareng. Bagi warga Jakarta sih emang cukup jauh, cuman worth it lah buat dicoba.

Pertama baru nyobain masakan Mexico, pertama tau ini tempat sihh dari Zomato. Eh lama-lama penasaran jg pengen rasain kayak apa sih makanan khas Mexico. Pas dateng kesini sekitar jam stgh6 sore, sepi banget,tempat nya kecil sihh tapi ya lucu lahh imut-imut gitu. Pas masuk langsung ke kasir.. nahh gw order Hard Shell Tacos topping beef and cheese. Hmm rasa nya si kalo menurut gw kurang bumbu di beef nya, trus jg terlalu banyak minyak banget, jd lumayan nge ganggu juga kalo lagi nge gigit makanan nya tiba-tiba langsung banjir minyak dari beef nya.

Salah satu tempat nongkrong baru di citos, Denger-denger sih mereka terkenal sama menu smoothies bowl juga gyutan don nya. Akhirnya saya bersama teman-teman datang kesini untuk coba makanan disini.. Tempatnya lumayan besar dan simple, mereka punya lampu sebagai penghias utama.. Pencahayaan nya lumayan redup dan emang cocok banget buat nongkrong bareng temen. Pelayanan nya ramah tapi sedikit kurang tau mengenai menu-menu disini mungkin karena baru banget kali ya.. Kami pesan: - Smoothies Bowl: Ini beneran enak dan seger banget, kalo kenyang pilihan alternatifnya bisa menu satu ini, fresh banget. Lengkap dengan granola, stroberi dan pisang, smoothies nya sendiri udah enak banget! - Gyutan Don Original: Porsi nya lumayan besar dan dagingnya lumayan banyak, rasa dagingnya sendiripun enak dan bumbu nya pas.. cocok sama nasinya padahal saya kesini dalam keadaan kenyang loh! haha enak! - Hotham: Enggak ada yang pernah salah dengan yakult apalagi dicampur yogurt hehe! seger banget..

Buat yang avail makan pork, temenku non muslim blg disini must try. Aku makan chicken kurang tasty sih tp ya lumayan lah dibanding tempat lain. Harganya wajar2 untuk porsi dan tempat yg nyaman, pelayannya jg baik dan cepat.
Bakmie hitamnya enak. Pelayanan oke. Sempat antri sebentar tapi cepet kok. Penyajiannya pun cepat. Sayang kuah baksonya tidak begitu panas.

I had my first molecular gastronomy experience at Namaaz Dining and it was so memorable. We can only make online reservations and they serve max 29 guests per day. It is a 17 course meal of Indonesian food with free flow Fiji water. For me it is a one-time thing to try some new dining experience, I really suggest to bring your friends along to make the experience more fun.

Super not recommended tmptnya. Cm kekinian aja. Rasa kurang enak. Harga overprice apalg sushi sen roll nya. Dan 1 yg bikin gak puas d sini service nya gak oke banget. Baru abis bayar, waiter nya uda nanya "mbak masi berapa lg yah d sini, soalnya tamunya uda marah2?" So what. Emang saya gak bayar apa d sini? Org jg tau uda mulai waiting cm gak usa nanya seperti itu menunjukkan pelayanan gak bagus d sini. Baru 1 stgah jem d sini msa d usir seperti itu, sory to say pelayanan plg buruk d resto ini.
Buat pecinta bakmi pasti tau banget nih bakmi sanming, they serve the best bakso goreng beneran deh!!!!!! Mie nya juga selalu enak, nyerep bgt gitu bumbunya.
Quiet n Cozy place, romantic dine in recommended or just for hangout with friends. They served well. The local indonesian foods are delicious so with the western.
Oriental food choices here. Very nice and tasty but quite a queue. The dimsum menu is nice but the tim pork bun is not as good as I expected. Overall a nice eating place

Just got back from eating here. The ornament caught my attention so i chose to dine here. The price was surprisingly cheap. They put same prices for each and every kind of dimsums (12rb). They got interesting prices, what about the taste? It was good actually, pretty good taste for this kind of prices. I ate bakpau pasir emas and it was delicious as normal price dimsum at mall. Surely will come back again.

Careful with wine promo price.. I see in elevators there's discount at Thursday 20% and more almost 40% for wine i guess.. The fact is.. Wine discont only for Alexis wine.. In menu pricelist only 562k... But the waithers said the real price is arround 900k .. The resto not yet updating the price.. The funny is, they using Acer Tab for menu.. Its only take 2 minutes to updating the price.. Remember guys that's realy not a marketing strategy, its bad for business..

First try, couldn't say much, I only tried the cafe latte and apple ...(forgot the name but I took a pict). I'm a latte drinker, but not a fan of their latte. The apple ... Was just ok. Too sweet. But I'll come back to try their savory plates!,hmmmm another coffee shop in town, specially kelapa gading area.. I bet kelapagading people now love the cozy coffee shop for chit chat... I tried the normal coffee the latte, taste quite good for the mix of coffee and milk plus additional sandwiches I tried the pork bacon scramble egg and chili and the new menu grilled chicken with pesto sauces plus roasted capsicum... i love the tasteeeee... u can try to chit chat with friends in the TOF sicallia.

I've always been a fan of bah kuh teh in Singapore, but never got the chance to try Song Fa so I was excited to finally dine here. Same quality as Founder's Bah Kuh Teh and price wasn't too far off from SG's. Place is small so expect a queue on weekend lunch and dinner times. (Approx 30 minute wait. ) Good deal for Jakartans who are looking for their pork fix.

Dari kemarin lewat tp blm sempet cobain, liat designnya dr depan eye catching bgt kaya p&b or carnivor style gtu. Akhirnya jumat kemarin cobain, sayangnya pas msk bau rokoknya cukup menyengat walaupun mnrt saya design di dlm cukup cozy yah dengan posisi bar di tengah. Nah sekarang masuk ke makanan: 1. Nasi goreng gila nya so so aj 2. Kwetiau gorengnya agak keasinan tp ms level bisa dimakan (non halal) 3. Sate ayam nge hitznya sih kurang bgt haha.. Ntah krn ga suka dgn bumbunya yg taican atau keliatan terlalu plain gtu 4. Ayam cabe cabe-annya enak cuman porsi 1 orang ini dan pedas banget, yg ga kuat makan pedes mending jgn pesen hoho.. Sebenarnya pgn cobain kopinya dgr2 dari anomali, tp yah kemarin lg makan siang rasanya ga afdol kalo minum kopi :) But overall nice place, dgn note kalau diajak tmn baru terpaksa dtg karena benci banget sama bau rokok.
Love love love... Go try the dark chocolate and also the affogato 👍🏻👍🏻 For those who love gelato you have to try this new hits.. Harganya mahal sih apalagi affogato nya satu cup 80k tapi worth it 😁

Sushi yang enak and murah .. salmon nya enak n fresh banget .. gw suka bgd klo ke kelapa gading makan ini .. klo di banding sm sushi lain dia itu gak kalah enak and harga nya itu murah .. rekom bgd deh 👏👏

Tempatnya keren tapi service nya sangat buruk . Saya dateng kemaren sore hujan tapi dibiarin berdiri . Nggak SOPAN saya diladenin sama yang pakai kacamata . Sombong sekali kalo bicara . Mungkin managementnya kurang bisa mengatur dengan baik . Saya kecewa sekali dan bikin saya kapok datang lagi .

Terasa panas, Terasa Pedas"" Begitulah bunyinya kalo makan di waroeng SS. Suasananya panas, dan makanannya puedes sekali. Kesini karena lagi ngidam sayur asem (bukan ngidam sambel). Waktu mau pesan dilayani sama mba yg super ramah. Mbanya bilang kalo sayur asemnya limited, alias laku keras! Hebat ni sayur, tp untungnya masih kebagian. Sayur asemnya nikmat, pedes dikit, asem manis asinnya pas! Lalu selain sayur asem, ayam bakarnya juga mantab! Dagingnya tebel dan bumbunya meresap sempurna. Ga kalah empuk juga deh roasted chicken di resto2 mahal. Untuk sambal saya gak pro krn ga suka pedes, asalkan sambelnya ada bawangnya udah pasti enak dan wangi. Yang saya makan pun bukan cabenya tp bawangnya :P Oya dan terakhir makan karedok dan terong goreng sebagai pelengkap. Karedoknya dipotong kecil2 jadi sekali sendok kesendok juga bumbu kacangnya, terlalu banyak, jd eneg. Untuk terongnya sebagai pelengkap saja, nikmatttt..

Saya tadi siang ini makan disini, awalnya saya order gurame asam manis, ayam mix (rebus & panggang 1kg), dan cap cay. Setelah gurame datang, baru diinfo jika ayam panggangnya belum ready dan barus bisa yang rebus saja. Kekecewaan muncul kenapa tidak dari awal diinfokan. Terus pesan cumi katanya tidak ada lagi, jadi ganti ke udang goreng telur asin yg biasa. Tapi pas datang yang tiba porsi besar. Kecewa lg. Ditambah kecewa lg dengan datangnya minuman, jumlah keluarga 5, tapi datang 6. Ya dibiarkan aj, krn kasian sm waitressnya. Untuk rasa, ikan asam manis 8/10 Udang goreng telur asin 8/10 Cap cay 4/10 (asin bgt) Dan kecewa bertambah lagi, credit card ga bisa pdhl ada promo BCA. Trus coba debit pun tidak bisa. Akhirnya cash. Kecewa dengan service disini dan dengan cap cay.
Macaroni standart,pelayanan ga ramah. Disamping tamu malah ada pegawai yg nyapu,takut debu kena makanan. Minta sendok garpu harus berkali kali

Haloo kambing mania 😊 Sop kambing yg satu ini so creamy tapibtetep berasa ya bumbunya 👍🏻 juara buat sop kambing sih menurut aku.. Dibandingin yang di jl.biak 😂✌🏻️ Kenal banget sama yang dagang, lumayan sering sih makan disini.. Soalnya bisa jalan kaki dari tumah mertua... Kaki lima bang anen ini adanya deket bgt sama warung bu kris.. Sate nya si rada keras ya.. Emang spesialisnya di sop ya saudara2 bukan disate. Saking doyannya makan sop bang anen juga kami sediakan diresepsi kami waktu itu 😊 after party banyak yg nanya itu sop kambing nya siapa yg jualan 😅 jadi kamu harus coba ya.. Tapi inget loh ini sopnya model creamy gtu krn sptnya ada campuran susu dan samin nya 😉
Service TOP Taste TOP Place TOP Apa ya minusnya..... Lumayan pricey sih memang tp ga nyesel kokkk. Dari mulai appetizer, main course, dessert te o pe jg deh hahahah i'll be back soon😊
Udah lama ga kesini, waktu pertama ksni design nya cewek bgt, serba ungu, walpapernya paris ala ala. paling suka di outdor lt.2 kalo malem2 berasa romance nya hihi

Setiap datang ke flavor bliss, pasti udah hukumnya buat dateng ke bakerhood dan beli rotinya. Biasanya aku selalu beli yg kayak sus bentuknya tp dengan isi krim milo. Suka banget sama roti-roti di bakerhood terutama yang ini, dan milo longjohnnya juga enak tapi untuk aku porsinya agak besar dan isinya sangat banyak! Puas banget hahahaha untuk tempatnya juga sangat cozy untuk ketemu orang karena ada cafenya atau ngopi santai sama temen2 juga enak, suasananya ngedukung bgt! Recommended banget deh bakery yang satu ini! 😄
Salah satu resto jadul di muara karang, bangunan lama masih berdiri. Rasa makanan tetap enak, tahu kipas nya enak dan saya suka sayur asem nya. Cumi (lupa namanya) juga harus dicoba

Pelayanannya jelek banget, parah. Sorry to say. Temen saya pesen soto ayam, saya pesen ayam bumbu rujak. Setelah 20 menit nunggu, Mba-nya nyamperin lagi ke meja dan bilang kalo soto ayam-nya habis. Jadi daritadi 20 menit pesenan kita belum dibikin gitu? Akhirnya ganti jd soto daging. Agak kesel sih tapi yaudah. Setelah itu pesenan kita ga dateng-dateng lamaaaaaaaa banget, dari laper sampe ga mood makan. Pas dimakan, oh my God nasinya keras banget. Bener-bener keras. Dan end up ga bisa dimakan nasinya. Ini nasi sisa kemarin apa gimana ya? Hehe. Sorry banget tapi ini benar-benar mengecewakan. Rasa makanannya juga amburadul. Tahu tempenya ga enak, soto ayam temen saya jg ga enak, tapi ayam bakar bumbu rujaknya yah lumayan lah. Intinya super bad experience here, pelayanannya sangat sangat mengecewakan. Se-parah-itu. :)

Pertama kali makan disini. Setelah sering sekali lewat depan resto n liat sering rame jg. Tp sorry to say makanannya gk selera gw. Dari menu2 yg gue pesen rasa nya biasa aja. Padahal dah mnta menu yg fav disitu. Di tambah lagi pelayanan nya kurang oke. Mngkin itu bs jg mempengaruhi selera makan seseorang ya. Pelayannya jutek. Di mintain sendok gk jwb iya cm lewat trus jln lg, terus lama. Pdhal waktu itu paling cm ada 5-6 meja customer nya. Dan wktu gw makan kebetulan kynya itu ada pemilik tmpt nya. Sama gak ramah nya. Mulut nya lempeng n gk ada senyum sm sekali. Yah mngkin suasana hati dese lg gk oke yeyy.. ?
Paling enak nih kesini,apalagi buat nge date,sama keluarga juga nyaman tempat nya..makanan nya murah murah,gak jauh dari bogor kota.romantissss coyyyy tempat nya

This is my favourite place when i want to drink a milk haha :p, Mommilk make me and my friends seems drink at home :), Mom Milk have a 2 place for a sit, indoor and outdoor, Me and Friends bought 3 Mom Milk King Size! (pict: Hazelnut

Niatnya mau makan ditempat lain cuma kalo lewat atau kedapetan parkir di depan sini pasti jd makan disini terosss. Karna kebetulan suka bgt sushi haha. Enak kok diatas standar lah sama sushi2 yg lain. Dari SMA pasti kesini sm temen2 sampe skrg udah kuliah tingkat akhir msh suka kesini lol. Awalnya yg di TIS Tebet terus ditebet utara tempat yg awalnya kecil direnov diperbesar. Masuk kategori fave lah hoho

Klo lagi pingin sop duren, pasti datengnya ke sini.. Gak terlalu jauh dr rumah dan cocoklah rasanya.. Tadi pesen pisang bakar coklat keju, manis bingits. Susunya super banyak, mesisnya juga banyak tapi kejunya sedikit, jadi cepet eneg makannya..

First time coming here on Saturday afternoon. It wasn't that difficult finding the space, so I was happy! 😃 A modern coffeeshop with cool, trendy interiors but yet feels homey. Spacious with few layout seating choice (I especially love the outdoor!). Ordered my usual: Cappuccino. Just perfect in taste! Then ordered Spaghetti Aglio Olio w/chicken. Not too salty, not too oily, generous chunks of chicken. They have lots of choices for desserts/cakes to go along with your coffee too! I opted for Layered Cheesecake as recommended by the barista and owner. Soft, not too sweet and cheesy (pun intended), just perfect to go along with my hot Red Velvet Latte. Will be back sometime soon!

Favorite hangout place that never fails to serve the best Bakmi ever!!! Highly recommended. You can choose between the soft noodle or the thicker (Makassar) noodle, with a variety of meat. Their specialty is pork, but they also serve chicken. If you're not up for noodles, they also serve delicious red fried rice. Enjoy!

Made it here on their first month of opening. Came here to taste the new space by chef Fernando Sindu, as I am a big fan of his cookings. It is the first watch store collaborated with a lounge and dining area. As i just grabbed my lunch, I only ordered Mushroom Rice and Pork Skewer. Delicious beyond words, the dishes kept me captured in its richness and beautiful texture.
